name: Magic Defender
description:
Defend the magical crystal casting powerful spells at the hordes of monsters!

Endless hordes of monsters are attacking your magical crystal, souce of your power. You are the last defender and must protect it for as long as you can, vanquish your enemies with a variety of powerful spells and get stronger.

- Absorb the energy of fallen enemies, and unlock new spells.

- Upgrade your spells to make them more powerful.

- Use arcane relics to boost your spells and defences.

This game was made using the Godot Engine.
